title: Bug 124776Set drillthrough with bookmark to chart value series, preview in web viewer, can not link to book mark.
description: Set drillthrough with bookmark to chart value series, preview in web viewer, can not link to book mark.Steps:1.Create a target report, create some items, set one item's bookmark to "abc"2.Create a new report, create a chart, set url redirect to value series3.Set drillthrough to target report and select the bookmark "abc"4.Preview in web viewerActual Results:1.Click the chart series, can not link to book mark.Expected Results:1.Click the chart series, can link to book mark.
OB: Bug 124776Set drillthrough with bookmark to chart value series, preview in web viewer, can not link to book mark.
